fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.api.forward_chaining

Interface Chase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Profilable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChase, AbstractDirectChase, BasicChase, BreadthFirstChase, ChaseWithGRD, ChaseWithGRDAndUnfiers, SccChase

    public interface Chase
extends Profilable
    This interface represents a chase (forward chaining) algorithm seen as an iterative process.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA)

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Calls next() until hasNext() return false.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
      throws ChaseException
        Calls next() until hasNext() return false.
        Throws:
        ChaseException

      • execute

        void execute(long timeout)
      throws ChaseException,
             TimeoutException
        Calls next() until hasNext() return false. If the method execution time exceed the specified timeout (in milliseconds) then the method will be interrupted and a TimeoutException will be throw. A timeout of 0 means to wait forever.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException
        ChaseException

      • next

        void next()
   throws ChaseException
        Execute the next step of the saturation process.
        Throws:
        ChaseException

      • hasNext

        boolean hasNext()
        Returns:
        true if the saturation process needs other steps.
